alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 04 at 6:27AM MDT until April 04 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Dangerous Fire Weather Conditions Across Portions of the Area Today... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MDT /NOON CDT/ THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MDT /8 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 004, 015, 016, 027, 028, 029, 041, 042, AND 254... * Affected Area...In Colorado, Fire Weather Zone 254 Cheyenne. In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 004 Norton, Fire Weather Zone 015 Sheridan, Fire Weather Zone 016 Graham, Fire Weather Zone 027 Wallace, Fire Weather Zone 028 Logan, Fire Weather Zone 029 Gove, Fire Weather Zone 041 Greeley and Fire Weather Zone 042 Wichita. * Winds...WSW at 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph, shifting to the NW at 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph during the late afternoon and early evening. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 to 15 percent. * Impacts...Extreme and unpredictable fire behavior. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.
info.instruction: Avoid outdoor burning. Repeating, outdoor burning is NOT advised today. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.
